title: Counterspell
content:
tial in any party, the ability to completely nullify a spell that is about to be casted can be the difference between your party being alive or dead. Counterspell also mentions that it can only nullify it as long as the spell is equal or less than level 3, but if the spell that is being casted level 4, then Counterspell is required to be level 4 to counter it.

When a reaction is given, you can see what level is the spell by hovering on it and also the damage, one trick to realize the exact spel
